title: #BoycottABC trending after the network aired an ad showing AOC’s photo on fire during the Democratic debate
text:
Critics are likening the advert to a death threat against Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. . See full story.

Felicity Huffman will serve 14 days in prison — and people are furious it’s not longer

Many on social media compared her case to people locked up for years after stealing socks or a loaf of bread. See full story.

Victoria’s Secret will offer fewer discounts, which will make the brand turnaround tough

L Brands hosted its investor day, with a focus on the effort to revitalize the Victoria’s Secret brand. See full story.

Mortgage rates have jumped this week — but could they one day fall to zero?

President Trump has called for negative interest rates — but that wouldn’t be a boon for housing necessarily. See full story.

He moved to America at 20 with just $400, and retired at 53 to sail the world — here’s how he did it

Want to retire early? Atlanta residents Mark Erdos and his wife Cindy have some sage advice. See full story.

Soda sales have declined as consumers reach more frequently for bottled water and seltzers. See full story.
description: Critics are likening the advert to a death threat against Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. .
